summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Outbound Voice Bot application. All backend APIs are functional (100% success rate). Frontend UI is working correctly with proper agent selection, display, and Gemini 2.0 Flash integration for text-based testing. Hindi language support verified in both system prompts and LLM responses.

backend_issues.notes: All backend endpoints tested successfully. Gemini 2.0 Flash integration working correctly with Hindi responses.

frontend_issues.notes: Frontend is fully functional. All UI elements are working correctly. Design uses custom fonts (Space Grotesk, Inter) and appropriate teal-to-purple gradient. Text contrast is excellent.

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/agents - Successfully retrieves all agents including default Order Taking Agent
Backend: GET /api/agents/{agent_id} - Successfully retrieves specific agent details
Backend: POST /api/agents - Successfully creates new agents
Backend: PUT /api/agents/{agent_id} - Successfully updates agent information
Backend: POST /api/chat - Successfully sends messages to Gemini 2.0 Flash and receives Hindi responses
Backend: POST /api/realtime/session - Successfully returns session token for WebRTC
Frontend: Agent selection dropdown displays and works correctly
Frontend: Default Order Taking Agent is auto-loaded on page load
Frontend: Agent details display correctly (name, description, language: HINDI)
Frontend: Start Voice Call button is enabled and clickable
Frontend: Text message input accepts Hindi text
Frontend: Send message button successfully sends messages to backend
Frontend: Gemini 2.0 Flash integration works - receives and displays Hindi responses
UI Design: Custom fonts (Space Grotesk, Inter) are properly loaded
UI Design: Teal-to-purple gradient is applied appropriately
UI Design: Card borders are color-coded (teal, purple, blue)
UI Design: Text contrast is excellent for readability
